name: Outro
_source: speak;Eirika;Brother...|These ruins seem to go on forever...|Is there no end?
speak;Ephraim;I'm not sure if it ends either.|However, we have a duty to clear out all these monsters.
speak;Eirika;You're right brother.|We must stop this evil from coming into the world.
speak;Eirika;Where did that voice come from?
speak;???;Your bravery is needed, oh Twins of Fate...;top
speak;Ephraim;Are we needed to clear out this evil?
speak;???;You two have proven to destroy great evil, and we believe you can do it again.;top
speak;???;We are the spirits of those who tried to protect these ruins.|There is an ancient power here, but it will fall into the hands of evil soon if they aren't stopped.;top
speak;Ephraim;Is that so?|They must be stopped indeed if that is the case.|Can you tell us what evil has fallen upon these ruins?
speak;???;It is unknown to us, but they align to some malevolent force.|They have immense power though.;top
speak;Eirika;How are we to stop such a force?
speak;???;Reach out the bottom of the ruins and clear out the monsters.|You may take the treasure that is there, you have been proven trustworthy.;top
speak;Ephraim;Understood, we will purge this evil from this land for good.
speak;???;We give our eternal thanks.|We will give the last of our power to aid you in this trial.;top
alert;Eirika can now use Grand Sieglinde!;Grand_Sieglinde
alert;Ephraim can now use Grand Siegmund!;Grand_Siegmund
speak;Ephraim;I feel like I can take on anything.
speak;???;Please, Sacred Twins, purge the ruins.....;top
speak;Eirika;Yes, we will put your souls to rest.
